channel.title: Operator Activity on Concho Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Operator Activity on Concho Resources

item.title: Monthly Permits
item.description: Overview of Permitting Activity Currently only shows horizontal permits. Wells contains following permitting attributes: Company, Well Name, Well Type, Approval Date, Formation and Permit Depth. 2nd map attempts to identify permitted well pads using clustering. Note: Well counts do not include previously drilled or permitted wells. Top 20 operators are colored in map and chart.

item.title: Monthly Permits
item.description: Overview of Permitting Activity Live link to DrillingInfo which is updated daily Currently only shows horizontal permits Wells contains following permitting attributes: Company, Well Name, Well Type, Approval Date, Formation and Permit Depth 2nd map attempts to identify permitted well pads using clustering Note: Well counts do not include previously drilled or permitted wells at this time Top 20 operators are colored in map and chart April Permitting Activity {"

item.title: Eastern Delaware Maps
item.description: Focus Mapped completions beginning in 2015. Includes three maps showing activity by year (2015, 2016 and 2017-2018). Animation shows trend moving eastward toward Central Basin Platform. Operators initially targeting Wolfcamp A in Southern Delaware. South of RSPPâ€™s acreage, Mewbourne completed two Wolfcamp C/Ds in 2017. Lilis completed a single Wolfcamp B last year. Majority of Bone Spring activity concentrated in New Mexio. 2015 Activity 2016 Activity 2017-2018 Activity 2015-2018 Activity Over Time
